name: Snaps
description: What is the project about? Snaps is a WEB3 platform for short videos. Now not only the authors of short videos earn money, but also ordinary viewers! What makes your project unique? A social network that rewards not only content creators, but also ordinary viewers History of your project. The project was taken into development in mid-2022. In February 2023, the alpha version of the product was launched. In April 2023, the beta version of the product was launched. In May 2023, the open beta version of the product was launched. Whatâ€™s next for your project? A short video platform that rewards content creators and users for being active in a mobile app. What can your token be used for? The token is used as rewards for users of the Snaps mobile app for activity.
